newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Portuguese bonds recover with U.S. Treasuries.
newsitem.headline: Portuguese bonds recover with U.S. Treasuries.

text.p: Portuguese bonds recovered at the close in line with Treasuries, which rose in reaction to a slowing in growth in the U.S. manufacturing sector in June.

"U.S. Treasuries rose after the U.S. purchasing managers report, and Portuguese bonds recovered, but there was little volatility, and this situation will remain until the outcome of the Fed meeting is known," said one operator.
Another said: "Spreads against Bunds of between 70 and 75 basis points are a buy opportunity for Portuguese bonds. But tomorrow's FOMC meeting will encourage caution and liquidity will be tight."
